commands.name: az elastic monitor open-ai-integration create
commands.summary: Create a OpenAI integration rule for a given monitor resource.
examples: az elastic monitor open-ai-integration create --resource-group myResourceGroup --monitor-name myMonitor --integration-name default

commands.name: az elastic monitor open-ai-integration delete
commands.summary: Delete OpenAI integration rule for a given monitor resource.
examples: az elastic monitor open-ai-integration delete --resource-group myResourceGroup --monitor-name myMonitor --integration-name default

commands.name: az elastic monitor open-ai-integration get-statu
commands.summary: Get OpenAI integration status for a given integration.
examples: az elastic monitor open-ai-integration get-statu --resource-group myResourceGroup --monitor-name myMonitor --integration-name default

commands.name: az elastic monitor open-ai-integration list
commands.summary: List OpenAI integration rule for a given monitor resource.
examples: az elastic monitor open-ai-integration list --resource-group myResourceGroup --monitor-name myMonitor

commands.name: az elastic monitor open-ai-integration show
commands.summary: Get OpenAI integration rule for a given monitor resource.
examples: az elastic monitor open-ai-integration show --resource-group myResourceGroup --monitor-name myMonitor --integration-name default

commands.name: az elastic monitor open-ai-integration update
commands.summary: Update a OpenAI integration rule for a given monitor resource.
commands.syntax:
az elastic monitor open-ai-integration update [--add]
                                              [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                              [--ids]
                                              [--integration-name]
                                              [--key]
                                              [--monitor-name]
                                              [--open-ai-connector-id]
                                              [--open-ai-resource-endpoint]
                                              [--open-ai-resource-id]
                                              [--remove]
                                              [--resource-group]
                                              [--set]
                                              [--subscription]
